name: Bryan W. Whitfield Memorial Hospital Reviews

review.title: “Not a place to retire from.”
review.pros: Pros – Fun atmosphere. Most of the employees are laid back and can joke around while completing tasks. Most of the employees are formally trained within their field.
review.cons: Cons – Not an environment to grow within your field. There is not much diversity within departments to learn new skills. If you have any family/personal emergencies, don't expect anything from management in the form of scheduling flexibility or time off.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Offer better compensation for skilled personell. Acknowledge when an employee has made improvements in departments. Make sure all personel are licenced, trained, and accountable.
